overview: This time it’s double the trouble. Rajat, a virgin boy who has a huge crush on Riya, his colleague. And there is a troublemaker, Happy, his best friend. They both invite their dates on the same night. The epic sex comedy comes alive when they find out that they have just one condom in the entire house. Let’s find out which couple succeeds in having INTERCOURSE.
title: Intercourse 3
